import pandas as pd
import json
import io

def on_input(charac,values):
    Charc_Head = pd.read_csv(io.BytesIO(uploaded['CharHead.csv']))
    Charc_Value = pd.read_csv(io.BytesIO(uploaded['CharValue.csv']))
    
    Charc_Head_Data = Charc_Head[['characteristic','charcStatus','charcLength','charcDecimals','multipleValuesAreAllowed']]
    
    Charc_Head_Desc =  Charc_Head[['language','charcDescription']]
    
    Charc_Head_Data_list =  json.loads(json.dumps(list(Charc_Head_Data.T.to_dict().values())))
    
    Charc_Head_Desc_list =  json.loads(json.dumps(list(Charc_Head_Desc.T.to_dict().values())))

    for head_dict_i in range(0,len(Charc_Head_Data_list)):
        Head_desc_list = []
        Head_desc_list.append(Charc_Head_Desc_list[head_dict_i])
        Charc_Head_Data_list[head_dict_i].update(toCharacteristicDesc = Head_desc_list)
        
        Charc_Head_Data_list_loop_val = Charc_Head_Data_list[head_dict_i]
        Charc_Value_filter = Charc_Value[Charc_Value['ID']== Charc_Head_Data_list_loop_val['characteristic']]
        
        Charc_Value_Data_list_filter = Charc_Value_filter[['charcValuePositionNumber','charcValueDependency','charcValue','charcFromNumericValue']]
        Charc_Value_Desc_list_filter = Charc_Value_filter[['language','charcValueDescription']]
        
        Charc_Value_Data_list =  json.loads(json.dumps(list(Charc_Value_Data_list_filter.T.to_dict().values())))
        Charc_Value_Desc_list =  json.loads(json.dumps(list(Charc_Value_Desc_list_filter.T.to_dict().values())))

        for value_dict_i in range(0,len(Charc_Value_Data_list)):
            Value_desc_list = []
            Value_desc_list.append(Charc_Value_Desc_list[value_dict_i])
            Charc_Value_Data_list[value_dict_i].update(toCharcValueDesc = Value_desc_list)
        #print(Charc_Value_Data_list)
  
        Charc_Head_Data_list[head_dict_i].update(toCharacteristicValue = Charc_Value_Data_list)
        
    
    api.send("out", api.Message(attributes={"message.batchTotal":len(a)},body=json.dumps(Charc_Head_Data_list)))

api.set_port_callback(["input1","input2"], on_input)

attributes.expression:
CASE SUBSTR_BEFORE('dataFormat',')')
when 'varchar' then 'CHAR'
when 'number' then 'NUM'
else 'CHAR'
END
